articles.title: Delta variant of Covid now dominant in European region, warn WHO and ECDC - Mint
articles.description: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), the WHO said that efforts to prevent transmission of the Delta variant must be reinforced
articles.content: The SARS-CoV-2 Delta variant of concern is now the dominant variant in most of Europe, the World Health Organisation (WHO) warned on Monday.

articles.title: Europe tried to boost Covid-19 vaccine takeup with carrots. Now some leaders are breaking out the sticks - CNN
articles.description: As the pace of Covid-19 vaccinations in Europe shows signs of a slowdown, leaders are racing to find answers to a key dilemma of the rollout's next phase: how to convince reluctant citizens to roll up their sleeves.
